channel.title: Pages on life-lessons.in
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on life-lessons.in

item.title: Gurpreet Luthra
item.description: I am currenty focussing my energies towards Social Impact, Open Source, Public Health, Bahmni and related areas of Tech4Good, with the hope that all I do helps make the world a better place. I work at ThoughtWorks as part of the Social Impact & India Public Health Team. In 2 years at tavisca, Pune (2018-2020), I played the role of the Head of Product Practice, where I focussed towards instilling a culture of excellence in Product design and development.

item.title: Presentations
item.description: Public Speaking and Sharing… I enjoy sharing information on things I learn and do. Listed below are some of my recent presentations on various Technical and Open Source topics. Most presentations need a voice over, since I am big on visuals and keeping slides clutter free. If you have any questions about these topics, or would like me to present them at your office, or a conference, I would be very glad to help out.
